wikipedia_page.main: Hugh Barclay (1799–1884), was a Scottish lawyer and sheriff substitute of Perthshire.

response: * Hugh Barclay of Ladyland ( 1592), Scottish Catholic and poet
* Hugh Barclay (lawyer) (1799–1884), Scottish lawyer and sheriff substitute of Perthshire
* Hugh Barclay (architect) (1829–1892), Scottish architect, see Kilmarnock
